'''An Interesting Labor''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[City of Winds and Idylls]]''.

It is featured in certain time trials such as the gliding trial during the [[Story Quest]] ''[[License to Glide]]'' and the Festival Challenge ''[[Invitation of Windblume/Festive Challenges#Floral Freefall|Floral Freefall]]'' from the [[Version 1.4]] event [[Invitation of Windblume]].
